amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease the funding for the Public and Indian Housing Tenant-Based Rental Assistance Program by $177,362,500, excluding veterans, elderly, and the disabled.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to decrease the funding for the Public and Indian Housing Tenant-Based Rental Assistance Program by $177,362,500, excluding veterans, elderly, and the disabled.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 295 (Roll no. 451).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 295 (Roll no. 451).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Grothman.
